txt.en:
'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert scholar! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan scholar, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert scholar in Rivendell.

'If you impress Forgamthan, he may allow you to use the superior library to create great works from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

'If you impress Forgamthan, he may allow you to use the superior library to create great works from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Crafting: A Superior Library

Forgamthan is in Elrond's Library in Rivendell.\n\nYou should complete Forgamthan's task for your advancement as a Scholar.
'You should speak with Forgamthan.'

Forgamthan is near in Elrond's Library in Rivendell.\n\nYou should speak with Forgamthan and give him news of your success in scroll-making.

'Well done, [placeholder]. Your work was greatly admired by the Elves who received your fine scrolls. They were moved by the scholarly craftsmanship and by the unique skill that went into making each one. I am impressed!\n\n'You are truly ready to begin your journey as an artisan scholar and beyond. The superior studies can be found here, as well as in many high-level areas throughout Middle-earth. I look forward to hearing of your renown as a great scholar of our time!'
You have grown swiftly and steadily as a Scholar and are now nearly ready to begin using more advanced facilities. The superior library awaits!
